name: Arcing Smash
rules: Traitor Hero Required; Destroy target opposing equipment and all opposing equipment with the same cost as that equipment.
flavour: When helms are cracked, skulls aren't far behind. - Codex of Defense

name: Aura of Anger
rules: Traitor Hero Required; Ongoing: Heroes and allies in your party have +1 ATK while attacking damaged heroes and allies.
flavour: My soul longs for vengeance - Illidan Stormrage

name: Crushing Shadows
rules: Traitor Hero Required; Each opponent discards a random card, and your hero deals shadow damage to his hero equal to that card's cost.
flavour: Its darkness can strangle heroes and suffocate hope.

name: Doom Blossom
rules: Traitor Hero Required; Attach to target hero or ally, and put three blossom counters on Doom Blossom.;Ongoing: At the start of your turn, your hero deals 1 shadow damage to attached character for each blossom counter, and then you remove one. If none remain, destroy Doom Blossom.

name: Fel Geyser
rules: Traitor Hero Required; Ongoing: Opposing quests have As an additional cost to complete, turn another one of your quests face down.
flavour: Gurtogg Bloodboil's taste for destruction has a way of erupting onto his foes.

name: Fel-Acid Breath
rules: Traitor Hero Required; Target opponent chooses three allies in his party, in order. Your hero deals 3, 2, and 1 nature damage to them, respectively.

name: Hateful Strike
rules: Traitor Hero Required; If target player has exactly one ally in his party, destroy it.
flavour: A strike borne of malice and executed with hatred.

name: Needle Spine
rules: Traitor Hero Required; When target hero or ally deals combat damage to your defending hero this turn, your hero also deals that much ranged damage to it.
flavour: My patience has run out! Die! Die!

name: Tidal Burst
rules: Traitor Hero Required; Your hero deals 3 frost damage to target opposing ally and each other opposing ally with the same cost as that ally.
flavour: Feel the wrath of the deep!

name: Ashtongue Battlelord
rules: Traitor Hero: When Ashtongue Battlelord enters play, destroy target undamaged opposing ally. Loyal Hero: When Ashtongue Battlelord enters play, destroy all damaged opposing allies.

name: Ashtongue Rogue
rules: Traitor Hero: Elusive, Ferocity Loyal Hero: Long-Range, Stealth
flavour: We'll see where my tribe's loyalties lie once we make our move. - Akama

name: Bonechewer Behemoth
rules: Traitor Hero Required; When Bonechewer Behemoth enters play, he deals 4 fire damage to target hero.
flavour: Brimstone and fire follow in his wake.

name: Bonechewer Shield Disciple
rules: Traitor Hero Required; Protector

name: Charming Courtesan
rules: Traitor Hero Required; If Charming Courtesan would be dealt 2 or less damage, prevent it.
flavour: That which you desire lies this way, hero.

name: Coilskar General
rules: Traitor Hero Required; When Coilskar General enters play, put three Naga ally tokens into play 1 [Melee] ATK / 1 health.

name: Coilskar Wrangler
rules: Traitor Hero Required; 2, Destroy an ally in your party -> Each opponent destroys an ally in his party.
flavour: His pets are ill-treated and ill-tempered.

name: Illidari Archon
rules: Traitor Hero Required; When Illidari Archon attacks, you may ready one of your resources.
flavour: Their souls are committed to the darkest of purposes.

name: Illidari Blood Lord
rules: Traitor Hero Required; When Illidari Blood Lord enters play, each player turns one of his face-up resources face down.
flavour: This world belongs to the Illidari.

name: Priestess of Dementia
rules: Traitor Hero Required; 2, Destroy an ally in your party -> Each opponent destroys an ability or equipment he controls.
flavour: She spreads the Betrayer's madness to every corner of the Black Temple.

name: Promenade Sentinel
rules: Traitor Hero Required; When Promenade Sentinel enters play, it deals 2 arcane damage to each of up to three target heroes and/or allies.
flavour: Unauthorized entry detected. Engaging annihilation protocols.

name: Sister of Pain
rules: Traitor Hero Required; When Sister of Pain attacks, she deals 1 shadow damage to target opposing hero.
flavour: Pain is inevitable, but the suffering is optional.

name: Sister of Pleasure
rules: Traitor Hero Required; Protector When Sister of Pleasure defends, she heals 1 damage from target hero or ally.
flavour: When it comes to the needs of Illidan's troops, Mother Shahraz knows best.

name: Temple Concubine
rules: Traitor Hero Required; If Temple Concubine would be dealt 3 or more damage, prevent it.
